ENVGA               1110 11 101001 0000 0000 00000000 0000
start0 MOV R0, #0   1110 00 111010 0000 0000 0000 00000000
LDR R1, [R0, #0]    1110 01 011001 0000 0001 000000000000
TOGG                1110 11 001001 0000 0000 00000000 0000
start1 CMP R1, R0   1110 00 010101 0001 0000 00000000 0000
BEQ end             0000 1010 000000000000000000000001
ADD R0, R0, #1      1110 00 1 0100 0 0000 0000 0000 00000001
B start1            1110 1000 000000000000000000000101
ADD R0, R0, #1      1110 00 1 0100 0 0000 0000 0000 00000001
B start0            1110 1000 000000000000000000001010
